titles.title: Lord I life your name on high

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: LORD I LIFT YOUR NAME ON HIGH newline LORD I LOVE TO SING YOUR PRAISES newline I'M SO GLAD YOU'RE IN MY LIFE newline I'M SO GLAD YOU CAME TO SAVE US

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: YOU CAME FROM HEAVEN TO EARTH newline TO SHOW THE WAY newline FROM THE EARTH TO THE CROSS newline MY DEBT TO PAY newline FROM THE CROSS TO THE GRACE newline FROM THE GRAVE TO THE SKY newline LORD I LIFT YOUR NAME ON HIGH.
